title: Tumor-associated immune cells hinder frontline chemotherapy drug in pancreatic cancer

title_detail.value: Tumor-associated immune cells hinder frontline chemotherapy drug in pancreatic cancer

summary: A frontline chemotherapy drug given to patients with pancreatic cancer is made less effective because similar compounds released by tumor-associated immune cells block the drug's action.

summary_detail.value: A frontline chemotherapy drug given to patients with pancreatic cancer is made less effective because similar compounds released by tumor-associated immune cells block the drug's action.
